item.description:
Are you a trivia buff?  Even if you aren't, what would you say to a night out with friends and a discounted dinner? :-)

The third Thursday of every month is our group's STUMP Trivia night at a quaint little place on Route 1 in Danvers.  For more information, check out: http://stumptrivia.com/ Basically, we are going to form teams of 6 and answer trivia questions for 2 hours that could be about anything under the sun.  If we win, the group wins gift certificates to pay for dinner the next time. :-)

If this event fills up and you want to come, let me know!  We can support a third team and I can increase the RSVPs easily.  So don't feel like this is a closed group. :-)

Please try to arrive on time so we can secure tables as the place gets filled up fast.

Hope to see you there! :-)

 

Note: We still have money left over from previous wins to discount people's dinners tonight for anyone who wants to come.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Stump Trivia Night in Danvers
